1.03.name: wordpress/connect-address
1.03.description:
Connect Address plugin connects the api key with the connect address backend and allows customers of connect address to place the connect address plugin into their wordpress shopping cart, allowing the connect address widget to kick in and work correctly. To use connect address, you must have an API key, which is generated through the connect address website. (https://connectaddress.com/panel/)

Connect Address Version 1.03

You'll need an connectaddress.com API key to use it. The current version published as of April 2, 2013 is version 1.03
